verses.roman:
pūrve yena raghunātha saba āyodhyā lañā
vaikuṇṭhake gelā, anya-jīve āyodhyā bharāñā

synonyms: pūrve—previously; yena—as; raghunātha—Rāmacandra; saba—all; āyodhyā—the population of Āyodhyā; lañā—taking with Him; vaikuṇṭhake gelā—went back to Vaikuṇṭhaloka; anya-jīve—other living entities; āyodhyā—Āyodhyā; bharāñā—filling.
translation: "Previously, when Lord Rāmacandra left this world, He took with Him all the living entities of Āyodhyā. Then He filled Āyodhyā again with other living entities.
